description: Trait data from a study testing the effect of bee traits and behaviour on the reproduction of a single Chamaecrista species.
Trait data from a study testing the effect of rhizobium infection and soil type on the floral atractiveness of a single Chamaecrista species.
A continously updated list of Chamaecrista species with confirmed root nodulation and their bacteriod type.
A time-calibrated phylogenetic tree of 231 Chamaecrista species based on five molecular markers.
Geogrpahic data from a study assessing the evolutionary correlation between plant life forms and environmental conditions in a clade of Chamaecrista.
